note.p: Birth: Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk, England (09 October 1750)
Death: The house of his friend Henry Bankes, at Kingston Hall, Wimborne, Dorset (14 November 1827)
Burial: Near the western end of the south aisle, Winchester Cathedral, Hampshire
Education: BA (1772) MA (1775) DD (1784) Pembroke College, Cambridge;
Career: Tutor to William Pitt; Private Secretary to William Pitt (1782-1787); Canon of Westminster (1784-1787); Bishop of Lincoln (1787-1820); Bishop of Winchester (1820-1827)
